body.raw:
In this guide, you will learn the tooling used in [Cal.com](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com).

# What's tooling?
You might be wondering what tooling means. If you check out [Bulletproof React's Project Standards](https://github.com/alan2207/bulletproof-react/blob/master/docs/project-standards.md),
it describes tools such as ESLint, Prettier, Husky etc.,

Similarly, in this guide, we provide an in-depth Cal.com tooling analysis.

# Cal.com tooling:

Cal.com is a monorepo, you will find more information about monorepo in Cal.com's Project Structure. We provide 
analysis of the tooling used:
1. [At root level](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com)
2. [In apps workspace](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/apps)
3. [In packages workspace](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/packages)

Tooling might vary based on an app or packages.

## Tools used at root level:
- [.changesets](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.changeset)
- [.github](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.github)
- [.husky](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.husky)
- [.snaplet](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.snaplet)
- [.vscode](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.vscode)
- [.well-known](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.well-known)
- [.yarn](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/.yarn)
- [__checks__](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/__checks__)
- [.editorconfig](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.editorconfig)
- [.eslintignore](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.eslintignore)
- [.eslintrc.js](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.eslintrc.js)
- [.gitignore](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.gitignore)
- [.gitpod.yml](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.gitpod.yml)
- [.kodiak.toml](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.kodiak.toml)
- [.npmrc](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.npmrc)
- [.nvmrc](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.nvmrc)
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.prettierignore)
- [.prettierrc.js](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.prettierrc.js)
- [.yarnrc.yml](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/.yarnrc.yml)
- [Procfile](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/Procfile)
- [app.json](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/app.json)
- [checkly.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/checkly.config.ts)
- [gh.env](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/gh.env)
- [git-init.sh](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/git-init.sh)
- [git-setup.sh](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/git-setup.sh)
- [i18n-unused.config.js](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/i18n-unused.config.js)
- [i18n.json](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/i18n.json)
- [i18n.lock](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/i18n.lock)
- [playwright.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/playwright.config.ts)
- [setupVitest.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/setupVitest.ts)
- [turbo.json](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/turbo.json)
- [vitest.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/vitest.config.ts)
- [vitest.workspace.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/vitest.workspace.ts)
- [yarn.lock](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/yarn.lock)

## apps/web workspace tooling

- [.eslintignore](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/.eslintignore)
- [.nvmrc](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/.nvmrc)
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/.prettierignore)
- [calendso.yaml](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/calendso.yaml)
- [cron-tester.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/cron-tester.ts)
- [instrumentation.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/instrumentation.ts)
- [middleware.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/middleware.ts#L2) with [next-collect](https://www.npmjs.com/package/next-collect)
- [next-i18next.config.js](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/next-i18next.config.js)
- [postcss.config.js](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/postcss.config.js)
- [project.toml](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/project.toml)
- [sentry.client.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/sentry.client.config.ts)
- [sentry.edge.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/sentry.edge.config.ts)
- [sentry.edge.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/sentry.edge.config.ts)
- [sentry.server.config.ts](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/sentry.server.config.ts)
- [tailwind.config.js](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/tailwind.config.js)
- [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/tsconfig.json)
- [vercel.json](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/blob/main/apps/web/vercel.json)
